course_description: Continuation of Japanese 102. This course aims to further develop language skills and increase familiarity with Japanese society. The emphasis is on accurate communication in Japanese, both spoken and written, that is appropriate to the given context.
prerequisites: JPN 102 or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
